# Lead Velocity - High-Performance Insurance Leads

## About Us
Lead Velocity provides structured, qualified business insurance leads for brokers in South Africa.
We focus on connecting you with verified decision-makers (Directors/Owners) for significant assets.

## Core Offerings

### Pilot Program (Promotional)
- **Cost**: R6,000 (once-off)
- **Duration**: 30 Days
- **Deliverables**: 10 Guaranteed Qualified Business Leads
- **Targeting**: Logistics, Engineering, SMEs
- **Qualification**:
  - Decision Maker Verified
  - R1M+ Contents OR R4M+ Building Value
- **Commission**: 10% of broker commission (on placed business)

### Pricing Tiers (Monthly)

#### Bronze (Growth Starter)
- **Cost**: R8,500/mo
- **Volume**: ±17 Leads
- **Focus**: Standard delivery, refining process.

#### Silver (Scale & Optimise) **[Recommended]**
- **Cost**: R10,500/mo
- **Volume**: ±23-26 Leads
- **Focus**: Higher volume, bi-weekly reviews, priority delivery.

#### Gold (Performance Partner)
- **Cost**: R16,500+/mo
- **Volume**: 33-40+ Leads
- **Focus**: Maximum volume, protected delivery, strategy negotiation.

## Contact
- **Website**: https://www.leadvelocity.co.za
- **Email**: info@leadvelocity.co.za
